active_learning.discussion_prompt: Should cybersecurity enforcement prioritize deterrence (e.g., harsh penalties like GDPR's 4% global turnover fines) or rehabilitation (e.g., mandatory training)? Debate using real cases like Uber's 2016 breach cover-up ($148M settlement under various laws) or Equifax breach (HIPAA/CCPA implications). Address the misconception that enforcement always requires legal action rather than internal measures.
